title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Clay and Buck on fireworks, 4th of July plans. The tax charges against the Trump organization are total crap. Left again swings and misses, after 3 years all they could come up with were very minor tax charges against the Trump CFO, questionable violations that are rarely charged as crimes. The process is the punishment. Left continues to game legal system to harass Trump. If they can do it to him, they can do it to anyone. Clay breaks down the indictment: $1.7 million over 15 years is a tiny portion of the Trump Organization tax returns. Left is poking the bear, provoking Trump to run again. Clay and Buck on 4th of July food choices.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
